notes: USA-based supplier specializing in ashwagandha root extracts with various standardizations and adaptogen blends. Supplies to cosmetics, personal care, food, and supplement industries. Applications: stress-relief skincare, anti-aging products, wellness cosmetics. Water-soluble and oil-soluble extracts available. Mid-range pricing ($40-70/kg) with flexible MOQ for various industries. Organic and GMP certified. USA-based direct distribution with application guidance and formulation assistance.
